description: This hearty vegan lasagna is made with layers of noodles, rich cashew ricotta and hearty mushrooms and lentils simmered in spicy tomato sauce.
name: Vegan Mushroom Lentil Lasagna
recipeIngredient: About 12-16 dried lasagna noodles (just under a pound)
8 oz. cremini mushrooms, (stemmed and coarsely chopped)
2 tbsp. granulated sugar, (or sweetener of choice)
1-2 tsp. red pepper flakes, (optional, or to taste)
1 cup raw cashews, (soaked in water 4-8 hours, drained and rinsed)
3 tbsp. unflavored soy or almond milk
1 lb. firm or extra firm tofu, (drained)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions, until al dente. Drain in a colander and return to the pot. Toss with a few dashes of olive oil to avoid sticking.
